document.title: Technical Bulletins: New Law Changes the Definition of Police Officer and Sets for Auxiliary/Reserve Officers in Tennessee
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin discusses changes in Tennessee Code Annotated (TCA) and the Rules of Tennessee Peace Officer Standards and Training (P.O.S.T.) Commission regarding the status and definition of part-time, temporary, reserve, and auxiliary officers within police departments.
